summary: A collection of unit test modules that verify the behavior of UI state reducers across the application, ensuring that actions such as adding, clearing, receiving, requesting, and handling errors correctly update the corresponding slices of state for changesets, events, groups, notifications, profiling, rules, rule text, system data, trust information, and user data.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the reducer logic that manages client-side state, preventing regressions and guaranteeing that UI components reflect accurate data after each action.
